scripts.build:html: rm -rf docs/html && slidev build html.md -o docs/html --base /web-ukazky/html/
scripts.build:css: rm -rf docs/css && slidev build css.md -o docs/css --base /web-ukazky/css/
scripts.build:flexbox: rm -rf docs/flexbox && slidev build flexbox.md -o docs/flexbox --base /web-ukazky/flexbox/
scripts.build:responsivity: rm -rf docs/responsivity && slidev build responsivity.md -o docs/responsivity --base /web-ukazky/responsivity/
scripts.build:js: rm -rf docs/js && slidev build js.md -o docs/js --base /web-ukazky/js/
scripts.build:dom-and-events: rm -rf docs/dom-and-events && slidev build dom-and-events.md -o docs/dom-and-events --base /web-ukazky/dom-and-events/
